product_name: KVD BeautyTattoo Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner
summary: SummaryKVD's #1 bestselling extreme-precision, Tattoo Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner, now clinically reformulated with transfer-proof long wear, higher-intensity pigment + smoother flow, in a luxe aluminum pen designed to resist dry-out.
details: DetailsBenefitsParaben-free formula stays inky for a smooth-yet-steady glide without bleeding, feathering, skipping, dragging or drying upWaterproof + transfer-proof long wearBolder, smoother, better ink flowFeaturesHigh-opacity pigment locks in place for fade + smudge-resistant all-day wear0.01mm extreme precisionIconic needle-precise brush tip you love for intricate linework, lash line fills + beyondItem 2624745How To UseTATTOO PREPGive Tattoo Liner a good shake before uncapping.Apply on clean skin.Pro tip: Have oily eyelids? Apply your favorite mattifying eye primer or eye-safe powder before laying down your lines.KEEP IT FLOWINGApplied it over eyeshadow? Clean the brush off with a wet paper towel before you cap it to avoid buildup in the brush.Store Tattoo Liner by laying it flat to balance ink flow between uses.DOT/DOT/GLIDEUse the precision tip to draw dots + create a guideline for your winged liner.Connect the dots + fill in your line.MIXED MEDIASlice a wing with Tattoo Liquid Liner + tightline with Tattoo Pencil Liner (sold separately).Bonus: Use Tattoo Pencil Liner in hi-viz pop shades to adorn your liquid lines.FAUX FRECKLES + BROWSUse Mad Max Brown to create fake freckles or brow hairs.IngredientsTrooper Black: Aqua/Water/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., 1,2-Hexanediol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Beheneth-30, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Black 2 (Ci 77266) [Nano].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: TATTOO PREPGive Tattoo Liner a good shake before uncapping.Apply on clean skin.Pro tip: Have oily eyelids? Apply your favorite mattifying eye primer or eye-safe powder before laying down your lines.KEEP IT FLOWINGApplied it over eyeshadow? Clean the brush off with a wet paper towel before you cap it to avoid buildup in the brush.Store Tattoo Liner by laying it flat to balance ink flow between uses.DOT/DOT/GLIDEUse the precision tip to draw dots + create a guideline for your winged liner.Connect the dots + fill in your line.MIXED MEDIASlice a wing with Tattoo Liquid Liner + tightline with Tattoo Pencil Liner (sold separately).Bonus: Use Tattoo Pencil Liner in hi-viz pop shades to adorn your liquid lines.FAUX FRECKLES + BROWSUse Mad Max Brown to create fake freckles or brow hairs.

reviews.headline: Never again...
reviews.comments: This used to be the holy grail but man the way they messed with the formula has killed it. Tranfers to the eyelid after an hour of wear. Dissapointing.

reviews.headline: They've completely changed the formula.
reviews.comments: They rolled out a new formula and it's absolutely awful. Why they would change a formula that has been a holy grail formula for over a decade is a mystery. Save your money, do not buy the new version of this liner.

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: The product was almost dried up and very watery and didn't go on black.

reviews.headline: I pinky promise do not buy
reviews.comments: I never wrote reviews but if I can save a single person from my mistake I will. This was my holy grail eyeliner. I currently use a really old one that somehow hasnt dried out but is on its last legs. I bought a backup and finally tried it and they massacred my favorite eyeliner. Its almost squeaky trying to apply it and it keeps dragging and skipping. It dried down to a SUPER shiny finish which looks like rubber and tbh feels like rubber on my eyes, I can physically feel the wing sitting on my skin. This is now my least favorite eyeliner of all time and im mouring. If you loved this eyeliner this will do nothing for you I promise.

reviews.headline: Doesnt last like it used to
reviews.comments: I dont know if I got a bad batch, but the eyeliner smudges ans doesn't last as I remmber it used too. I remember I could go dancing all night wearing it and it lasted, now it doesnt last on a normal day

reviews.headline: New Formula is Just Bad
reviews.comments: Used to love this; was my holy grail. Now I have to find a new one because they changed the formula and it dries out super fast. Lame.

reviews.headline: Please bring back the old formula
reviews.comments: This uses to be my favorite liner for jaripeos but now it smudges and is not waterproof. Someone please recommend a  new one

reviews.headline: Came dried out
reviews.comments: I never had this problem with the old KVD tattoo liner, but reading the reviews now I understand. It came completely dried, rough, and unusable. I followed what others said about storing it upside down and it fixed it. It definitely stays and seems like a same or similar formula to before, but the applicator and the fact I have to store it like that is terrible. I recommend looking for another eyeliner, this isnt it. KVD has gone downhill, Im so bummed. They wouldnt let me return either.

reviews.headline: Devastated with New Formula
reviews.comments: I have used this product for about 15 years and loved it. Loved it so much that I have recommended it to countless people over the years. I just purchased a new one and it is the "new and improved" version but it is awful. The tip is stiffer, the product flow is not even, it pills up and doesn't layer well, overall disappointing. I don't know why KVD Beauty would ever touch such a perfect product but this is a tragedy, please go back to the previous formula and packaging. I am begging.

reviews.headline: New formula transfers
reviews.comments:
Why did they have to go and ruin the best eyeliner of all time?!  I worked in cosmetics for 10 years and fell in love with this liner.  I was apprehensive about them reformulating, and sadly for me, it completely ruined the product.  
I NEVER had this liner crease up on my lid before, and now the reformulation does.  I have tried 3 tubes to make sure it wasn't just a one-off, but sadly it creases after 7-8 hours.  That may sound good, but that means after the work day, my eyelids are sticking and the liner transfers before I can go out after work.

I have tried dozens of other liners and have yet to find a perfect replacement, as many are not the brush tip I love, or they crease/smudge much faster.  The closest I've found in formula is the Rare Beauty one, though the packaging shape is a little different to get used to (designed to be easier to grip though for people with hand dexterity issues).

RIP to the greatest liquid liner of all time. ðŸª¦

reviews.headline: Not waterproof
reviews.comments: I think they changed their formula and it is no longer waterproof. I appreciated this eyeliner before because I have hooded eyes and need something that won't smudge - now it does. Will be returning & looking for something else.

reviews.headline: dry out
reviews.comments: dry out in a few days

reviews.headline: PERFECT for swimming
reviews.comments: so ive been looking for a good waterproof eyeliner and i was hoping this one would work, i put it on let it dry for idk 40 minutes (i got distracted) and then wiped it hard with a wet qtip, it barley rubbed off and i would say this for swiming aslong as its not harsh swimming is PERFECT. a little bit of a steep price but its really worth it.

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: This flakes off within the first 20 minutes of putting it on, so I ended up with little black flecks all over my face whenever I've worn it.  Tried it a handful of times and each time it flakes off and looks like the crackle nail polish. Not good

reviews.headline: Lasts 1 day
reviews.comments: Dries out immediately. I even bought another one to make sure it wasn't defective. How are people giving this good ratings? I dont trust any of these reviews giving this eyeliner 5 stars when they all have nothing in them.

reviews.headline: The worst
reviews.comments: The worst eyeliner i ever used, very light color and dried after 10 days of using it.

reviews.headline: Smudges
reviews.comments: Do not purchase. This eyeliner will smudge.

reviews.headline: Upset - New Formula Smudges on to of eye
reviews.comments: I've used this eyeline for a while and love it. I purchased recently the "new and improved" formula version. It smudges like crazy on the top of my eye and does not stay in place! I'm so sad. Please go back to the old formula that worked!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: Glides on and stays all day. Sometimes I smudge it with a brush before it dries for a Smokey look.

reviews.headline: Dry
reviews.comments: Dried out after only 2 weeks of use, probably a total of 10 actual uses. That's even with storing it tip down like I do with every other liquid liner I've used

media.headline: The new formula is not worth your money!
media.caption: Original formula on the left. New formula on the right.

media.headline: I would buy the product again
This is my new favorite liquid liner!
it doesn't smudge or fade, even after long hours!
media.caption: precise eyeliner !!

media.headline: It's good if you like liquid eyeliner
Accurate Pen and Smudge Proof Liner
This is the best eyeliner out there!
media.caption: Obsessed

media.headline: I love the new design! More precise application
media.caption: I love the new design!

media.headline: I will buy this product again.
Horrible new formula
media.caption: Here it is swiping my finger across it lightly. Just smudges everywhere. It's a totally different formula and is also clogging my ducts.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Hey beauties! ðŸ’– Today, I am beyond excited to share my thoughts on a product that has completely revolutionized my eyeliner game â€“ the KVD Tattoo Liner in the shade Trooper Black 10. If you're searching for that perfect, go-to eyeliner, keep reading because this might just be it!

ðŸ–¤The packaging is sleek, chic, and edgy â€“ exactly what you'd expect from KVD Beauty. But it's what's inside that truly counts. This iconic waterproof liquid eyeliner boasts tattoo-bold pigment and a needle-precise brush tip that makes drawing the thinnest, sharpest lines an absolute breeze. And trust me, when I say precise, I mean it! The ultra-fine bristles glide effortlessly between each lash, giving you smooth, gap-free lines every single time. Whether you're aiming for a subtle day look or a dramatic wing, this liner delivers. Plus it dries almost instantly. 

ðŸ–¤One of the standout features for me is how user-friendly it is. The flexible tip hugs your lash line beautifully, giving you total control. It's incredibly easy to draw a fine line with just light pressure â€“ perfect for those crisp, sharp wings that everyone loves. If you're feeling bolder, a bit more pressure will give you a thicker, more dramatic line. The versatility of this formula is genuinely impressive. I've used it to create everything from classic winged liner to more graphic, editorial looks. It even doubles up for faux freckles and brow detailing if you're feeling extra creative.

ðŸ–¤The performance is stellar. As someone with oily eyelids, finding a liner that stays put all day is a challenge. But the KVD Tattoo Liner is long-wear, smudge-resistant, and waterproof. It stays flawless from morning to night without a hint of smudging or fading. Whether you're sweating it out at the gym or caught in a rain shower, this liner won't budge. High-performance is an understatement â€“ it truly lives up to its name.

ðŸ–¤A couple of pro tips: For best results, store your Tattoo Liner flat and give it a good shake before use. If the tip feels a bit dry, simply wipe it with a damp tissue to remove any eyeshadow build-up. This little trick keeps the ink flowing perfectly every time.

ðŸ–¤Oh, and did I mention it's 100% vegan and cruelty-free? It feels amazing to use a product that aligns with my values and performs so well.

ðŸ–¤ The KVD Tattoo Liner in Trooper Black 10 has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. Its precision, staying power, and versatility make it a must-have for anyone who loves a fierce eyeliner look. Whether you're a makeup newbie or a seasoned pro, this liner is sure to impress. Go ahead and give it a try â€“ your eyeliner game will never be the same! ðŸ’«
faceoff_positive.headline: Gives the perfect thin line .

faceoff_negative.comments:
I never post reviews, but this eyeliner was so infuriating to me that here I am. Like many other reviewers, I'm a long time user of Kat Von D's tattoo liner, but this new formula makes it worse than any eyeliner I've ever used. 

The applicator is so hit or miss -- you either get an onslaught of eyeliner or hardly anything at all.

But I've dealt with annoying applicators, that's not a deal breaker for me. But this eyeliner somehow manages to transfer onto my eyelid during normal wear (and I've tried every combination of setting spray and setting powder and nothing has helped) while simultaneously being absolutely impossible to get off at night when I take my makeup off. I use an oil cleanser and a regular cleanser, have started scrubbing my eyes, and I STILL wake up in the morning with flakes of eyeliner smeared on my face. I literally exchanged the first one I got because I thought the one I'd bought was just defective. Nope.

Wherever this formula was "clinically reformulated," it was not on planet earth.
faceoff_negative.headline: New formula is terrible
